summary: Three thieves escape from a heist, one of them killing the other two. He is sheltered by a prostitute and sought after by the police, but only after ten years his true motivation unravels.
cast: Rentarô Mikuni|Sachiko Hidari|Kôji Mitsui|Yoshi Katô|Sadako Sawamura|Susumu Fujita|Akiko Kazami|Seiichirô Kameishi|Shûsuke Sone|Mitsuo Andô|Rin'ichi Yamamoto|Shôken Sawa|Tadashi Suganuma|Sachi Shindô|Yuriko Anjô|Kôji Sekiyama|Itsuma Mogami|Tatsuya Kitayama|Kôsaku Okano|Nobuo Yana|Hajime Kubo|Gôzô Sôma|Junnosuke Takasu|Shirô Ôki|Genji Kawai|Ryô Suga|Osamu Yamanouchi|Sakae Shima|Shôhachi Uchikoshi|Hideo Murota|Yûji Kitamine|Tomiko Makinouchi|Asako Maki|Yuki Hayami|Mineo Matsudaira|Kiyoshi Matsukawa|Osamu Kimura|Takashi Sawamura|Kôsaku Mita|Ryô Mihara|Tamae Araki|Hisako Kawamura|Akio Suzuki|Tadashi Katô|Masanobu Ôkubo|Takashi Toyama|Shinko Endô|Junji Nishimura|Sadao Yagi|San'yû Saitô|Kinto Tamura|Akira Yano|Chineko Sugawara|Ken Takakura|Junzaburô Ban
title: Kiga kaikyô
